\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* having \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w loins|strong="G3751"\w* \w of|strong="G5485"\w* \w your|strong="G1722"\w* \w mind|strong="G1271"\w* girt up, \w being|strong="G4771"\w* \w sober|strong="G3525"\w*, \w trust|strong="G1679"\w* perfectly \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* offered \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w revelation|strong="G0602"\w* \w of|strong="G5485"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*,

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G3956"\w* hath \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w*, \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w manner|strong="G0391"\w* \w of|strong="G3956"\w* conversation \w holy|strong="G0040"\w*:

\w For|strong="G1360"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w grass|strong="G5528"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* thereof \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w flower|strong="G0438"\w* \w of|strong="G1391"\w* \w grass|strong="G5528"\w*. \w The|strong="G3956"\w* \w grass|strong="G5528"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w withered|strong="G3583"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w flower|strong="G0438"\w* thereof \w is|strong="G3588"\w* fallen \w away|strong="G3583"\w*.
